channel.title: Pokey Pokey
channel.description:
What the fuck are these things called? Anyway, another model from the land of Mario, and I will tell you, these eyes and mouths are starting to piss me off. Bullet Bill is a bitch to add the eyes. Anyway, that's for later. Here, we have that tall thing from the desert that in the 2d version is a pain in the ass to jump over. Rate, hate.
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/r2841h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/fdcd9c.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/72fxns.jpg[/img]

item.title: Pokey Pokey
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:9, topic:357191”]Since it is just spheres, why not spend more time on flower for some good detail, instead of what you have right now. And maybe make some textures instead of using materials.

And obbyme, technically I didn’t make it, but I do have it in mqo format. And I have Marth, and Ganondorf, and Link and all of the SSBB characters :D[/quote]
I would probably use textures if this was a higher poly program like 3ds max, but I’m not as concerned with that considering it’s only meta. That and I’m sure people will be like “MAKE IN CLIENT PL0X I GIVE REPZORS”

Read full topic

item.title: Pokey Pokey
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Since it is just spheres, why not spend more time on flower for some good detail, instead of what you have right now. And maybe make some textures instead of using materials.

And obbyme, technically I didn’t make it, but I do have it in mqo format. And I have Marth, and Ganondorf, and Link and all of the SSBB characters

item.title: Pokey Pokey
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:357191”][quote author=0bbyme link=topic=453709.msg3323240#msg3323240 date=1282878719]
@ the wanderer, did you make that mario model?

@ model: tbh its very basic, connecting spheres just doesnt make that good of a model.
[/quote]

Tell that to nintendo.[/quote]

Lol, Not a very “complicated” design is it? Never looked into the Mario characters, looks as if i should start looking into the good ol’ classic games

Also, about jumping over them, why not use Yoshi and eat them?

Read full topic

item.title: Pokey Pokey
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

the wanderer:

Try making the mouth and eyes a 2d plane instead of an actual sphere. Be much easier. Just segment it enough so it will fit around the model.

I tried, but segmenting it around the model is a pain.

Read full topic
